thread.title: Ferrellgas Loss Widens on Weaker Revenue, Acquisition Expenses
thread.title_full: Ferrellgas Loss Widens on Weaker Revenue, Acquisition Expenses - WSJ

author: Tess Stynes
title: Ferrellgas Loss Widens on Weaker Revenue, Acquisition Expenses
text:
Ferrellgas Partners LP said its loss widened in the latest quarter on a decline in revenue and expenses related to a recent acquisition.
The Overland Park, Kan.-based company, one of the U.S.â€™s largest propane retailers, is known for its Blue Rhino grilling tanks and has continued to expand by acquiring smaller propane businesses.
